member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect
member.summary: Scales an input bitmap to match a different DPI. This is useful for situations where a bitmap is created or loaded at a different DPI than the screen.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D DPI compensation effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DpiCompensationEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the DpiCompensationEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.SourceDpi
member.summary: Specifies the new DPI. Default value (96, 96).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for DpiCompensation effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.BorderMode
member.summary: Border mode for edge pixels. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1DpiCompensation GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0) with the specified transform transform on the specified drawing session.
